WorkItem.ClosedComment: I will definately get back to this for the Cataclysm model!
WorkItem.Description: Was interested in having a holy dps template for pvp and pve. That is.. id like to see esp how well it bursts for pvp, and the applications for pve currently, as that its results have been productive before ( I have tried in BC against many raid bosses and and found it better than expected).
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Would like to have the Holy spell dps template for pve and pvp

Comments.Message: Rawr.ShadowPriest actually supports Holy DPS modeling already.
Im trying it right now, and its alot harder to customize it for holy than shadow and putting talents in Surge of Light doesnt affect it at all.
nor does power infusion or pennace

Sadly enough, Holy DPS cannot keep up with Shadow at all in WotLK. So work on the Holy Part of the Priest DPS model has not been a big priority. I'll try to get around to dealing with Power Infusion however.
